title: Otitis media

fields.name: analgesia
fields.label: Analgesia advice
fields.default: Paracetamol and/or ibuprofen as directed (if safe for you).

body:
You were treated today for otitis media (middle ear infection).

Pain control:
{{analgesia}}

{{#if antibiotics}}Antibiotics: {{antibiotics}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Severe headache, neck stiffness, or confusion
- Swelling or redness behind the ear
- Persistent fever or worsening pain

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
